commentable_entity.ask: Petition to get Johnny Depp into the next Aquaman Movie or Any DC Comics Movie
commentable_entity.title: Petition to get Johnny Depp into the next Aquaman Movie or Any DC Comics Movie
commentable_entity.description: Johnny Depp has suffered financially from the loss of the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise. At the same time that his ex wife, Amber Heard, was preparing to star in Aquaman she was also writing an opinion piece for the Washington Post that alleged sexual and physical abuse. He is in the process of clearing his name in a defamation suit in a Virginia court regarding that article. There is a Change.org petition trying to get Amber Heard off of the next Aquaman. Mr. Depp could benefit from joining the DC Comics franchise. The fans want Johnny Depp back on the screen. We want Justice for Johnny!
commentable_entity.letter_body:
We are petitioning for Johnny Depp to have a place in the DC Comics and Aquaman movies. He has lost work and money due to allegations made against him by an actress currently working with Warner Brothers and the public is also petitioning for her to be removed from the Aquaman franchise. This petition only addresses Mr Depp’s opportunity to work as an actor and get back some of the respect and financial gain that he lost when he was not asked to perform again as Jack Sparrow in Pirates of the Caribbean. 
       The people will not go to see Aquaman if Amber Heard is in the movie. If Johnny Depp is given a role in it, or a role in any DC Comic movie it will be a huge hit. The fans will be very, very grateful and never forget that you helped him and us so that we could enjoy our favorite actor again. It will be box office Gold.

comment: I’m signing because I feel that Johnny Depp lost a franchise (Pirates of the Caribbean) unjustly and deserves a shot at another one. Fans are starting to request that lead roles in Aquaman be recast. People are thinking of boycotting the movie if Johnny’s ex wife, Amber Heard continues her role in the Aquaman franchise. I’d like to see Johnny Depp get a role in the DC Comics Universe and I think it could save not only his financial situation but Aquaman as well.
